SEARCH
Package org.example.server

Class ServerClientHandler

java.lang.Object
org.example.server.ServerClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ServerClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Handles client connections and processes commands from both TCP and RMI clients.

    • checkIfEnd

      public boolean checkIfEnd() throws RemoteException
      Checks if the game has reached an end condition.
      Returns:
      true if any player's point counter is 5 or more; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an issue with remote method invocation.
